A C D E G I M R S T W

C

client - package client
 
Client - Class in client
 
Client() - Constructor for class client.Client
Constructs a new Client
Client(JTextArea) - Constructor for class client.Client
Constructs a new Client, it gets as parameter a JTextArea in order to print the output there rather than on the console
ClientConnection - Class in client
 
ClientConnection(Socket) - Constructor for class client.ClientConnection
Constructs a new ClientConnection using the socket connected with the server, than ClientConnection initializes the dataInputStream using the passed socket.
ClientConnection(Socket, JTextArea) - Constructor for class client.ClientConnection
Constructs a new ClientConnection using the socket connected with the server, than ClientConnection initializes the dataInputStream using the passed socket, furtheremore, ClientConnection gets as parameter a JTextArea in order to print the output there rather than on the console
ClientTest - Class in test
 
ClientTest() - Constructor for class test.ClientTest
 
connect(String, int, String) - Method in class client.Client
The client connects to the server, the connection parameters such as the IP address and the port are passed to the method each time the client has to connect, the nickname is also required, because the fist message that is passed to the server is actually the nickname
